com.FCI.SWE.Services

Class Service

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.FCI.SWE.Services.Service

  • @Path(value="/")
@Produces(value="text/html")
public class Service
extends Object
    This class contains REST services, also contains action function for web application
    Since:
    2014-02-12
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mohamed Samir

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Service() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String AcceptService(String uname, String fname)
      accept friend request to be afriend Rest Service, this service will take your name and the name of the person who want to be afriend of you also check the two names in the data store
      String loginService(String uname, String pass)
      take the name and the password and sent to jason object and check the name and the password in the data store if they existed in the data store will go to your home page
      String registrationService(String uname, String name1)
      add friend Rest service, this service will be called to send .friend request This function will store user data in data store
      String registrationService(String uname, String email, String pass)
      Registration Rest service, this service will be called to make registration.
      String searchService(String uname)
      Login Rest Service, this service will be called to make login process also will check user name and returns his name from datastore

    • Method Detail

      • registrationService

        @POST
@Path(value="/RegistrationService")
public String registrationService(@FormParam(value="uname")
                                   String uname,
                                   @FormParam(value="email")
                                   String email,
                                   @FormParam(value="password")
                                   String pass)
        Registration Rest service, this service will be called to make registration. This function will store user data in data store
        Parameters:
        uname - provided user name
        email - provided user email
        pass - provided password
        Returns:
        Status json

      • registrationService

        @POST
@Path(value="/addService")
public String registrationService(@FormParam(value="uname")
                                   String uname,
                                   @FormParam(value="name1")
                                   String name1)
        add friend Rest service, this service will be called to send .friend request This function will store user data in data store
        Parameters:
        uname - provided user name
        friend - name provided friend name

      • searchService

        @POST
@Path(value="/searchService")
public String searchService(@FormParam(value="uname")
                             String uname)
        Login Rest Service, this service will be called to make login process also will check user name and returns his name from datastore
        Parameters:
        uname - provided user name
        Returns:
        user in json format search if his name is existed or no if existed will pass you to his home page else no

      • AcceptService

        @POST
@Path(value="/AcceptService")
public String AcceptService(@FormParam(value="uname")
                             String uname,
                             @FormParam(value="fname")
                             String fname)
        accept friend request to be afriend Rest Service, this service will take your name and the name of the person who want to be afriend of you also check the two names in the data store
        Parameters:
        uname - provided user name
        Returns:
        user in json format

      • loginService

        @POST
@Path(value="/LoginService")
public String loginService(@FormParam(value="uname")
                            String uname,
                            @FormParam(value="password")
                            String pass)
        take the name and the password and sent to jason object and check the name and the password in the data store if they existed in the data store will go to your home page
